author: Chris Edwardes
description: Rum based twist on the classic Old-Fashioned.
name: Naranja
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR one shot of rum with two ice cubes in a glass
Add sugar syrup, vermouth, bitters and two more ice cubes
STIR some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the rum
STIR lots more and add more ice
